title: Matplotlib ImageGrid Tutorial
description: Matplotlib is a data visualization library in Python used to create static, animated, and interactive visualizations. In this tutorial, we will explore how to use the Matplotlib ImageGrid to display a collection of images in a grid format with fixed aspect ratios.
